MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole, affecting properties in Kirklandhill Path and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. We are arranging to have a generator installed to restore supplies as we have a fault on an underground cable at the electricity pole at Kirklandhill Path and we now expect your supply to be restored by 1.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.05am on Tuesday 12th January 2021.
